heading: HJR0023
0: JOINT RESOLUTION TO ALLOT A BUDGET EQUIVALENT TO TWO PERCENT (2%) OF THE COUNTRY'S GDP TO EFFECTIVELY INCREASE THE PHILIPPINES' DEFENSE SPENDING AT PAR WITH THE ASEAN REGIONAL STANDARDS
status: Pending with the Committee on APPROPRIATIONS since 2019-11-11
history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HJR0023
FULL TITLE : JOINT RESOLUTION TO ALLOT A BUDGET EQUIVALENT TO TWO PERCENT (2%) OF THE COUNTRY'S GDP TO EFFECTIVELY INCREASE THE PHILIPPINES' DEFENSE SPENDING AT PAR WITH THE ASEAN REGIONAL STANDARDS
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : CABOCHAN, MANUEL III. D.
